casebody.data:
No. 48,

Orig.

Mississippi v. Arkansas.

[Motion for leave to file bill of complaint granted, 400 U. S. 1019.] Application for stay of proceedings in Chancery Court of Chicot County, Arkansas, in Arkansas Land & Cattle Co. v. Anderson-Tully Co., Civil Action No. 10,177, referred to Special Master for report and recommendation.
